```{r setup}
# Load dependencies
library(tidyverse)

# define function
weight_by_feed = function(data){
  result = data |> 
    # summarise by feed type
    summarize(weight = mean(weight, na.rm = T), .by = feed) |> 
    # sort rows by weight 
    arrange(weight) 
  
  # return result
  return(result)
}

# use function
weight_by_feed(chickwts)
```
